amendment.description: To establish requirements and prohibitions relating to the provision of health care services at Fort Leonard Wood, Missouri.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3799 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3799 proposed by Senator Wicker for Senator Hawley to Amendment SA 3748. To establish requirements and prohibitions relating to the provision of health care services at Fort Leonard Wood, Missouri.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3799 proposed by Senator Wicker for Senator Hawley to Amendment SA 3748.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3799 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
